member.name: T:RateLimitClient.JwtTokenHelper
member.summary: Helper class for parsing JWT tokens and extracting claims. This is a simple implementation without full JWT validation.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.JwtTokenHelper.ExtractClaim(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Extracts a claim value from a JWT token without validating the signature.
member.param: The name of the claim to extract (e.g., "oid", "sub", "email")
member.returns: The claim value, or null if not found

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.JwtTokenHelper.ExtractOid(System.String)
member.summary: Extracts the Object ID (oid) claim from a JWT token. This is commonly used in Azure AD / Microsoft Identity Platform tokens.
member.returns: The oid claim value, or null if not found

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.JwtTokenHelper.ExtractSub(System.String)
member.summary: Extracts the Subject (sub) claim from a JWT token. This is a standard claim representing the user identifier.
member.returns: The sub claim value, or null if not found

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.JwtTokenHelper.ExtractAllClaims(System.String)
member.summary: Extracts all claims from a JWT token.
member.returns: Dictionary of claim names to values, or empty dictionary on error

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.JwtTokenHelper.CreateSampleToken(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a sample JWT token for testing purposes. Note: This creates an unsigned token for demonstration only.

member.name: T:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHandler
member.summary: HttpMessageHandler that implements HTTP traffic shaping based on rate limit headers according to the IETF draft-ietf-httpapi-ratelimit-headers specification.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHandler.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new RateLimitHandler with default options.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHandler.#ctor(RateLimitClient.RateLimitHandlerOptions)
member.summary: Creates a new RateLimitHandler with the specified options.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHandler.#ctor(RateLimitClient.RateLimitHandlerOptions,System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler)
member.summary: Creates a new RateLimitHandler with the specified options and inner handler.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHandler.SendAsync(System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends an HTTP request with rate limiting applied.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHandler.GetTracker
member.summary: Gets the current rate limit tracker for diagnostics.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHandler.ClearState
member.summary: Clears all tracked rate limit state.

member.name: T:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHandlerOptions
member.summary: Options for configuring the RateLimitHandler behavior.

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHandlerOptions.WaitMode
member.summary: When to apply rate limit delays. Default is BeforeRequest.

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHandlerOptions.MaxDelayThreshold
member.summary: Maximum delay threshold to prevent DoS attacks from excessively high values. Default is 5 minutes.

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHandlerOptions.EnableProactiveThrottling
member.summary: Enable proactive throttling when approaching rate limits. When enabled, requests will be gradually slowed as quota is consumed. Default is true.

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHandlerOptions.ProactiveThrottleThreshold
member.summary: Threshold (0.0 to 1.0) for triggering proactive throttling. Default is 0.8 (80% of quota consumed).

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHandlerOptions.StateExpirationTime
member.summary: How long rate limit state remains valid without updates. Default is 1 hour.

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHandlerOptions.AutoRetryOn429
member.summary: Automatically retry requests that receive 429 Too Many Requests status. Default is false.

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHandlerOptions.GetLimitKey
member.summary: Custom function to determine the tracking key for a URI. Default tracks by scheme and host (e.g., "https://api.example.com").

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHandlerOptions.OnRateLimitHeadersReceived
member.summary: Callback invoked when rate limit headers are received and parsed.

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHandlerOptions.OnDelayCalculated
member.summary: Callback invoked when a delay is calculated and applied.

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHandlerOptions.OnTooManyRequests
member.summary: Callback invoked when a 429 Too Many Requests response is received.

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHandlerOptions.OnParsingError
member.summary: Callback invoked when an error occurs parsing rate limit headers.

member.name: T:RateLimitClient.RateLimitWaitMode
member.summary: Specifies when rate limit delays should be applied.

member.name: F:RateLimitClient.RateLimitWaitMode.BeforeRequest
member.summary: Wait before sending the request. This prevents sending requests that would be rate limited.

member.name: F:RateLimitClient.RateLimitWaitMode.AfterResponse
member.summary: Wait after receiving the response. This ensures rate limit info is applied to subsequent requests.

member.name: F:RateLimitClient.RateLimitWaitMode.Never
member.summary: Never wait automatically. The caller is responsible for handling rate limits.

member.name: T:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHeaderParser
member.summary: Parses RateLimit-Policy and RateLimit headers according to the structured field list format. Uses IStructuredFieldParser abstraction for parsing, allowing easy replacement with third-party libraries.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHeaderParser.ParseHeaders(System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpResponseHeaders)
member.summary: Parses RateLimit-Policy and RateLimit headers from HTTP response headers.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHeaderParser.ParseRateLimitPolicy(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a RateLimit-Policy header value. Format: "name";q=100;w=60,"name2";q=200;w=120

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHeaderParser.ParseRateLimit(System.String,System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Parses a RateLimit header value. Format: "name";r=50;t=30,"name2";r=100;t=60

member.name: T:RateLimitClient.RateLimitPolicy
member.summary: Represents a quota policy from the RateLimit-Policy header.

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitPolicy.Name
member.summary: Policy name/identifier.

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitPolicy.Quota
member.summary: Quota allocated in quota units (q parameter).

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitPolicy.WindowSeconds
member.summary: Time window in seconds (w parameter).

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitPolicy.QuotaUnit
member.summary: Quota unit type (qu parameter): "requests", "content-bytes", or "concurrent-requests".

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitPolicy.PartitionKey
member.summary: Partition key (pk parameter).

member.name: T:RateLimitClient.RateLimitInfo
member.summary: Represents current rate limit information from the RateLimit header.

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitInfo.PolicyName
member.summary: Policy name this limit applies to.

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitInfo.Remaining
member.summary: Remaining quota units (r parameter).

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitInfo.ResetSeconds
member.summary: Seconds until quota restoration (t parameter).

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitInfo.PartitionKey
member.summary: Partition key (pk parameter).

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitInfo.Timestamp
member.summary: Timestamp when this rate limit was received.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.RateLimitInfo.GetResetTime
member.summary: Calculates when the quota will reset based on timestamp and reset seconds.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.RateLimitInfo.GetTimeUntilReset
member.summary: Gets the time remaining until reset, accounting for elapsed time since the header was received.

member.name: T:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHeaders
member.summary: Contains parsed rate limit headers from a response.

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHeaders.Policies
member.summary: Policies from RateLimit-Policy header.

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHeaders.Limits
member.summary: Current limits from RateLimit header.

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHeaders.RetryAfterSeconds
member.summary: Retry-After value if present (takes precedence over reset parameter).

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.RateLimitHeaders.Timestamp
member.summary: Timestamp when these headers were received.

member.name: T:RateLimitClient.RateLimitTracker
member.summary: Tracks rate limit state and calculates delays needed for traffic shaping.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.RateLimitTracker.UpdateFromHeaders(RateLimitClient.RateLimitHeaders,System.Uri)
member.summary: Updates the rate limit state based on response headers.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.RateLimitTracker.CalculateDelay(System.Uri)
member.summary: Calculates the delay needed before the next request can be sent.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.RateLimitTracker.CalculateDelay(System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: Calculates the delay needed before the next request can be sent for a specific partition.
member.param: The partition key (e.g., user ID from token)

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.RateLimitTracker.WaitForRateLimitAsync(System.Uri,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Waits for the calculated delay before allowing the request to proceed.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.RateLimitTracker.WaitForRateLimitAsync(System.Uri,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Waits for the calculated delay before allowing the request to proceed for a specific partition.
member.param: The partition key (e.g., user ID from token)

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.RateLimitTracker.CalculateProactiveDelay(RateLimitClient.RateLimitState)
member.summary: Calculates proactive delay when approaching rate limit.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.RateLimitTracker.IsStateStale(RateLimitClient.RateLimitState)
member.summary: Checks if a rate limit state is stale and should be ignored.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.RateLimitTracker.GetLimitKey(System.Uri)
member.summary: Gets the key for tracking rate limits based on URI.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.RateLimitTracker.Clear
member.summary: Clears all tracked rate limit state.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.RateLimitTracker.GetCurrentState
member.summary: Gets current state for diagnostics.

member.name: T:RateLimitClient.RateLimitState
member.summary: Represents the tracked state for a rate limit policy.

member.name: T:RateLimitClient.StructuredFields.IStructuredFieldParser
member.summary: Interface for parsing HTTP structured fields per RFC 9651. This abstraction allows the parsing implementation to be swapped with a third-party library if needed.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.StructuredFields.IStructuredFieldParser.ParseList(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a structured field list value into individual items with their parameters. Example: "item1";param1=value1,"item2";param2=value2
member.returns: A list of parsed structured field items.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.StructuredFields.IStructuredFieldParser.ParseString(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a quoted string value, removing surrounding quotes. Per RFC 9651, strings are delimited with double quotes.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.StructuredFields.IStructuredFieldParser.ParseByteSequence(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a byte sequence value from structured field format. Per RFC 9651, byte sequences are formatted as :base64data:

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.StructuredFields.IStructuredFieldParser.SerializeByteSequence(System.String)
member.summary: Serializes a string value as a byte sequence for structured field format. Per RFC 9651, byte sequences are formatted as :base64data:

member.name: T:RateLimitClient.StructuredFields.StructuredFieldItem
member.summary: Represents a single item from a structured field list with its parameters. Per RFC 9651, an item consists of a bare item and optional parameters.

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.StructuredFields.StructuredFieldItem.Value
member.summary: The primary value of this item (typically a string or token).

member.name: P:RateLimitClient.StructuredFields.StructuredFieldItem.Parameters
member.summary: Parameters associated with this item as key-value pairs. Per RFC 9651, parameters are an ordered map of key-value pairs.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.StructuredFields.StructuredFieldItem.GetParameter(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a parameter value by key, or null if not found.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.StructuredFields.StructuredFieldItem.TryGetParameterAsLong(System.String,System.Int64@)
member.summary: Tries to get a parameter value and parse it as a long integer.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.StructuredFields.StructuredFieldItem.TryGetParameterAsInt(System.String,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Tries to get a parameter value and parse it as an integer.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.StructuredFields.StructuredFieldItem.HasParameter(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a parameter exists.

member.name: T:RateLimitClient.StructuredFields.StructuredFieldParser
member.summary: Default implementation of structured field parsing per RFC 9651. This implementation can be replaced with a third-party library if needed.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.StructuredFields.StructuredFieldParser.ParseList(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a structured field list value into individual items with their parameters. Format: "item1";param1=value1;param2=value2,"item2";param3=value3

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.StructuredFields.StructuredFieldParser.ParseString(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a quoted string value, removing surrounding quotes. Per RFC 9651, strings are delimited with double quotes.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.StructuredFields.StructuredFieldParser.ParseByteSequence(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a byte sequence value from structured field format. Per RFC 9651, byte sequences are formatted as :base64data: Returns the decoded UTF-8 string value.

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.StructuredFields.StructuredFieldParser.SerializeByteSequence(System.String)
member.summary: Serializes a string value as a byte sequence for structured field format. Per RFC 9651, byte sequences are formatted as :base64data:

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.StructuredFields.StructuredFieldParser.ParseItem(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a single item with its parameters from a raw string. Format: "item";param1=value1;param2=value2

member.name: M:RateLimitClient.StructuredFields.StructuredFieldParser.SplitListItems(System.String)
member.summary: Splits a structured field list by commas, respecting quoted strings.
